monster.name: Feymist Eagle
languages: Auran and Sylvan but can't speak them

trait.name: Keen Sight
entries: The creature has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Feymist Dust
entries: The creature's natural weapon attacks are treated as magical for the first 2 rounds of combat.

trait.name: Feymist Path
entries: 1/day when under 30% health the creature can teleport to the furthest random open space up to 40ft away from the current location.

action.name: Multiattack.
entries: The eagle makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its talons.

action.name: Beak.
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Talons.
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d4 + 3}) slashing damage.

monster.name: Don Chekhov (Awakened)
languages: Auran and Sylvan but can't speak them

trait.name: Keen Sight
entries: The creature has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Feymist Path
entries: 1/day when under 30% health the creature can teleport to the furthest random open space up to 40ft away from the current location.

trait.name: Feymist Weave
entries: The creature's natural weapons are permanently treated as magical.

action.name: Beak.
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 6}) piercing damage.

action.name: Talons.
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d4 + 6}) slashing damage.
